mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT INVT_NO, INVT_NAME FROM ESERVICE.DBO.FUND_TRANSACTION WHERE POLICY_NO = #{policyNo}

SELECT TOP 1 POLICY_NO ,INVT_NO ,INVT_NAME ,convert(varchar(10), #{startDate}, 120) SADP_TR_DATE ,NULL SADP_TR_CODE ,'期初餘額' SADP_TR_NAME ,SADP_SACNT_LEFBF SADP_TR_UNITS ,convert(varchar(10), #{startDate}, 120) SADP_EXCH_DATE ,ER.BUY_PRICE EXCHANGE_RATE ,ROUND(SADP_SACNT_LEFBF * ER.BUY_PRICE * FV.SELL_PRICE, 0) SADP_APPLY_AMT ,convert(varchar(10), #{startDate}, 120) SADP_TRIP_DATE ,FV.SELL_PRICE FUND_VALUE ,SADP_SACNT_LEFBF FROM ESERVICE.DBO.FUND_TRANSACTION LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.EXCHANGE_RATE ER ON convert(varchar(10), ER.EFFECTIVE_DATE, 120) = convert(varchar(10), #{startDate}, 120) AND EXCHANGE_CODE = INVT_EXCH_CURR LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.FUND_VALUE FV ON convert(varchar(10), FV.EFFECTIVE_DATE, 120) = convert(varchar(10), #{startDate}, 120) AND FUND_CODE = #{invtNo} WHERE POLICY_NO = #{policyNo} AND convert(varchar(10), SADP_TR_DATE, 120) > #{startDate} AND INVT_NO = #{invtNo} ORDER BY SADP_TR_DATE

SELECT POLICY_NO ,INVT_NO ,INVT_NAME ,SADP_TR_DATE ,SADP_TR_CODE ,PARAMETER_NAME SADP_TR_NAME ,SADP_TR_UNITS ,SADP_EXCH_DATE ,( CASE WHEN SADP_TR_CODE = 'INV104' THEN ER.SELL_PRICE ELSE ER.BUY_PRICE END ) EXCHANGE_RATE ,SADP_APPLY_AMT ,SADP_TRIP_DATE ,FV.SELL_PRICE FUND_VALUE ,SADP_SACNT_LEFBF FROM ESERVICE.DBO.FUND_TRANSACTION LEFT JOIN ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER ON PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID = 7 AND SADP_TR_CODE = PARAMETER_CODE LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.EXCHANGE_RATE ER ON ER.EFFECTIVE_DATE = SADP_EXCH_DATE AND EXCHANGE_CODE = INVT_EXCH_CURR LEFT JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.FUND_VALUE FV ON FV.EFFECTIVE_DATE = SADP_TRIP_DATE AND FUND_CODE = #{invtNo} WHERE POLICY_NO = #{policyNo} AND convert(varchar(10), SADP_TR_DATE, 126) BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND INVT_NO = #{invtNo} ORDER BY SADP_TR_DATE

SELECT TOP 1 POLICY_NO ,INVT_NO ,INVT_NAME ,convert(varchar(10), #{endDate}, 120) SADP_TR_DATE ,NULL SADP_TR_CODE ,'期末餘額' SADP_TR_NAME ,SADP_SACNT_LEFBF SADP_TR_UNITS ,NULL SADP_EXCH_DATE ,NULL EXCHANGE_RATE ,NULL SADP_APPLY_AMT ,NULL SADP_TRIP_DATE ,NULL FUND_VALUE ,SADP_SACNT_LEFBF FROM ESERVICE.DBO.FUND_TRANSACTION WHERE POLICY_NO = #{policyNo} AND convert(varchar(10), SADP_TR_DATE, 120) > convert(varchar(10), #{endDate}, 120) AND INVT_NO = #{invtNo} ORDER BY SADP_TR_DATE
